== Karimba -II (627621) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Karimba -II is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 935 hectares and harbouring 2700 households with total population of 11930 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 23 km. Male population is 5744 and female population is 6186. Scheduled Caste Population is 1199 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the village is 627621<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 9739 (81.63%)
* Literate male population: 4774 (83.11%)
* Literate female population: 4965 (80.26%)
